description: Table T(n,k) giving log_b(k), 1<=k<=p, where p = n-th prime and b = smallest primitive root of p (A001918).
references: T. M. Apostol, Introduction to Analytic Number Theory, Springer-Verlag, Table 10.2, pp. 216-217.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 08 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Apr 09 2000
